Headline: Revised: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express, #151 Sheridan Temporary Southbound Reroute at Sheridan/Winthrop
ShortDescription: Revised: SB 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp. & 151 Sheridan buses rrtd via Sheridan, Broadway, Granville, & Sheridan at Sheridan/Winthrop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: Southbound #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express and #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Broadway, Granville, and Sheridan, due to street blockage near Sheridan/Winthrop.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
